item.title: Hatsune Miku Mobile April Update
item.dc:creator: Spookie
item.description:
Hello everyone! Today we’re introducing the latest Hatsune Miku Mobile content update for April! The cherry blossoms are in full bloom and spring is coming to Hatsune Miku Mobile, isn’t that awesome!? ■ Android Live Wallpaper ■ Wallpaper Miku and KAITO Wallpapers ■ iPhone Wallpaper A Cute wallpaper with a refreshing blue sky and Miku …

The post Hatsune Miku Mobile April Update appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Hello everyone!

Today we’re introducing the latest Hatsune Miku Mobile content update for April!

The cherry blossoms are in full bloom and spring is coming to Hatsune Miku Mobile, isn’t that awesome!?

■ Android Live Wallpaper

■ Wallpaper
Miku and KAITO Wallpapers

■ iPhone Wallpaper A
Cute wallpaper with a refreshing blue sky and Miku in her uniform!

■ Stamp (common to Android / iPhone)
Perfect for Miku and Luka in the spring!

Get access to some bonus readable e-magazines!

This month’s merchandise are the “Jigsaw Puzzle / Sakura Miku Big Towel / Acrylic Stand & Can Badge & Key Holder”


This month’s song is “Love Magic Disco” by EasyPop

How To Install The April Update

  • After subscribing to Hatsune Miku Mobile for “Sugotoku” , you can access it from the menu Character / Deco-mail / Stamp.
    Compatible devices: iOS and Android devices (excluding some models) that support “Sugotoku Contents”
    Link: http://app.mikumoba.jp/RED004
  • After subscribing to Hatsune Miku Mobile for “au Smart Pass”, you can install the update from Categories / Entertainment / Character.
    Compatible devices: iOS and Android devices compatible with “au Smart Pass” (excluding some models)
    Link: http://app.mikumoba.jp/RED011
  • Hatsune Miku Mobile for App Pass
    After subscribing to App Pass, you can install the update from the “Entertainment” category.
    Compatible devices: Android devices that support App Pass (iOS is not supported)
    Link: http://www.softbank.jp/mobile/service/app-pass/
  • Hatsune Miku Mobile 500
    Price: ¥ 550 / month (docomo sp mode payment, au easy payment, S! Collective payment)
    Supported devices: iOS and Android smartphones (excluding some models)
    Link: http: //app.mikumoba.jp/RED014

Sources

Hatsune Miku Official Blog

The post Hatsune Miku Mobile April Update appeared first on VNN.

item.content:encoded:
Hatsune Miku VR is available on the popular platform Steam with a 50% OFF sale only for today!

Make sure to get the game cheaper before it’s too late!

【本日まで！！】
大人気VR音楽ゲーム「初音ミク VR」のSteam版が本体５０％OFFセール開催中！本日までです！お見逃しなく！https://t.co/IPPod8PVZw#初音ミクVR #初音ミク #VR #Steam pic.twitter.com/fyGCNGRJ43

— 初音ミク 公式 (@cfm_miku) March 16, 2020

The world-famous virtual singer Hatsune Miku invites you to join her on stage in in this VR music game! Simply put on your headset, choose a song then use your VR controllers to catch the melody symbols flying from the speakers at the back of the stage. But beware the long riff symbols and other challenges that will make it harder to reach the perfect score!

Links

Hatsune Miku VR on Steam

item.title: Hatsune Miku TAP Wonder’s Official Logo Revealed!
item.dc:creator: Spookie
item.description:
In celebration of March 9th or most commonly known among us as “Miku Day“, the official Hatsune Miku Twitter account has unveiled the new logo for the upcoming Hatsune Miku – TAP Wonder video game! What is Hatsune Miku – TAP Wonder? The concept behind the game is a casual, lighthearted game that anyone can …

The post Hatsune Miku TAP Wonder’s Official Logo Revealed! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
In celebration of March 9th or most commonly known among us as “Miku Day“, the official Hatsune Miku Twitter account has unveiled the new logo for the upcoming Hatsune Miku – TAP Wonder video game!

What is Hatsune Miku – TAP Wonder?

The concept behind the game is a casual, lighthearted game that anyone can pick up and play, and ‘create with everyone’. As part of this main concept, they will be collecting ideas and submissions via Piapro from players for various aspects of the game.

“Hatsune Miku -TAP WONDER” is aiming to release the game worldwide this spring for smartphones.

Check out the new logo below!

That’s not all, because a free wallpaper featuring an illustration of Hatsune Miku that will appear in Tap Wonder has also been released as well!

Note: There’s a smaller wallpaper available here if your phone screen size is not big.

Sources

Hatsune Miku Tap Wonder Official on Twitter

The post Hatsune Miku TAP Wonder’s Official Logo Revealed! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Crossing Void x Hatsune Miku Launching on March 9th!
item.dc:creator: Spookie
item.description:
Prepare to meet Miku, Luka & Rin/Len in this epic anime crossover RPG game featuring 50+ popular characters from franchises like SAO today! Nine South-East Asian countries join the grand launch on March 9th, 2020 of this wonderful Hatsune Miku collaboration with Crossing Void! Get ready to fight with your favorite characters from the Dengeki …

The post Crossing Void x Hatsune Miku Launching on March 9th! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Prepare to meet Miku, Luka & Rin/Len in this epic anime crossover RPG game featuring 50+ popular characters from franchises like SAO today!

Nine South-East Asian countries join the grand launch on March 9th, 2020 of this wonderful Hatsune Miku collaboration with Crossing Void!

Get ready to fight with your favorite characters from the Dengeki Bunko masterpieces in Dengeki Bunko: Crossing Void ( aka. Crossing Void ) – an anime crossover turn-based RPG game!

Game Information

Authentic Japanese Gaming Experience

    • Exclusively licensed by Dengeki Bunko, Crossing Void brings you brand-new storylines developed under direct supervision of the original authors!
    • Fabulous animated illustrations drawn by world-class artists!

Fascinating Anime Crossover

    • Iconic figures from 25 original Dengeki Bunko masterpieces collide and clash in this mysterious dimension!
    • Everyone is here! Kirito, Kuroyukihime, Asuna, Shizuo, Izaya, Shana, Mikoto … Who will you choose to be on your team?

Build Your Dream Team

    • Unlock, collect and upgrade your characters!
    • Prepare for strategic turn-based PVP battles!
    • Explore the unprecedented “cross skills” between two characters! Guess what kind of cross skill will Yuuki and Asuna use as a team in the battlefield?

Original Voice Cast

    • Professional voice acting cast from the original anime series!
    • Bonus interactive lines voiced by Rie Kugimiya, Hiroshi Kamiya, Kana Hanazawa and many others are waiting for you to explore!

You can download Crossing Void (Global) on iOS & Android here: https://app.adjust.com/opcm5f3

Links

Crossing Void Website
Crossing Void on Facebook
Crossing Void on Twitter

The post Crossing Void x Hatsune Miku Launching on March 9th! appeared first on VNN.

item.content:encoded:
Hello everyone! Today we will be showing you the content from “Hatsune Miku Mobile’s” newest March update.

  • Android Live Wallpaper
    Luka in a traditional outfit makes up for a gorgeous live wallpaper!
  • Wallpaper
    Miku and MEIKO in their volley outfits are ready to jump into your screen!
  • iPhone Wallpaper
    Miku’s gorgeous kimono wallpaper in which she finally announces spring’s arrival!
  • Stamps
    Enjoy some spring themed stamps from Miku and Lin Len!

Also some bonus readable e-magazines!

This month’s goods are “Figure-rise Bust Sakura Miku / Sakura Miku Charger / Acrylic Stand & Can Batch & Key Holder”


This month’s song is “Dramatic Walk” by Den Pol P (koyori)

How To Install The March Update

  • After subscribing to Hatsune Miku Mobile for “Sugotoku” , you can access it from the menu Character / Deco-mail / Stamp.
    Compatible devices: iOS and Android devices (excluding some models) that support “Sugotoku Contents”
    Link: http://app.mikumoba.jp/RED004
  • After subscribing to Hatsune Miku Mobile for “au Smart Pass”, you can install the update from Categories / Entertainment / Character.
    Compatible devices: iOS and Android devices compatible with “au Smart Pass” (excluding some models)
    Link: http://app.mikumoba.jp/RED011
  • Hatsune Miku Mobile for App Pass
    After subscribing to App Pass, you can install the update from the “Entertainment” category.
    Compatible devices: Android devices that support App Pass (iOS is not supported)
    Link: http://www.softbank.jp/mobile/service/app-pass/
  • Hatsune Miku Mobile 500
    Price: ¥ 550 / month (docomo sp mode payment, au easy payment, S! Collective payment)
    Supported devices: iOS and Android smartphones (excluding some models)
    Link: http: //app.mikumoba.jp/RED014

Sources

Hatsune Miku Official Blog

The post Hatsune Miku Mobile March Update appeared first on VNN.

item.title: “Hatsune Miku VR” Song Pack 3 DLC Has Been Released!
item.dc:creator: Spookie
item.description:
After waiting for a considerable amount of time, which doesn’t make the news less exciting, the “Hatsune Miku VR Song Pack 3” has finally been released! The news were confirmed via Hatsune Miku’s official Twitter which you can read here. The additional content is outlined below: 39 Music! (Music: Mikito P) Romeo and Cinderella (Music: …

The post “Hatsune Miku VR” Song Pack 3 DLC Has Been Released! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
After waiting for a considerable amount of time, which doesn’t make the news less exciting, the “Hatsune Miku VR Song Pack 3” has finally been released!

The news were confirmed via Hatsune Miku’s official Twitter which you can read here.

The additional content is outlined below:

  • 39 Music! (Music: Mikito P)
  • Romeo and Cinderella (Music: doriko)
  • Karakuri Clown (Music: 40mP)
  • Round the Square Earth (Music: TOKOTOKO (Nishizawa-san P))
  • Sing (Music: MusikM)

If you play the song “Romeo and Cinderella” you will have access able to play on the new “Cyber ​​Stage“!

Also, in celebration of the newly released DLC there will be an on-going discount campaign for the main game as well as for DLC 1 and 2 exclusively available for PS PLUS members!


Campaign Details

Discount Offer Period: From February 28 until March 27, 2020

  • 　”Hatsune Miku VR” ⇒ 10% OFF
  • 　”Hatsune Miku VR Song Pack 1″ ⇒ 20% OFF
  • 　”Hatsune Miku VR Song Pack 2″ ⇒ 20% OFF

Links

You can purchase HATSUNE MIKU VR and its DLCs from the following links:

HATSUNE MIKU VR Base Game

Hatsune Miku VR Song Pack 1

Hatsune Miku VR Song Pack 2

Hatsune Miku VR Song Pack 3

Sources

Hatsune Miku on Twitter

The post “Hatsune Miku VR” Song Pack 3 DLC Has Been Released! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: HATSUNE MIKU x Crash Fever 2020 Crossover Has Officially Begun!
item.dc:creator: Spookie
item.description:
This month, the worlds of Crash Fever and Hatsune Miku will face each other once again. Gear up and get ready to witness this expanded crossover as it comes alive with a series of new event quests that you don’t want to miss! For those that don’t know, Crash Fever is a combination puzzle-battle roleplaying game …

The post HATSUNE MIKU x Crash Fever 2020 Crossover Has Officially Begun! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
This month, the worlds of Crash Fever and Hatsune Miku will face each other once again. Gear up and get ready to witness this expanded crossover as it comes alive with a series of new event quests that you don’t want to miss!

For those that don’t know, Crash Fever is a combination puzzle-battle roleplaying game with tons of cool characters to collect.

Enjoy this new twist on your favorite virtual singers, unlock new units, conquer never before seen quests, and Hatchers, or suit up with your friends and experience newly created visual effects and songs during the battles. Revisit quests from previous events or play the new ones, the choice is yours!

The screenshots were provided by Monds

Login Bonus

Login during the days leading up to the event to unlock special items including 390 Music Notes and enjoy the many events that are going to take place within the game!

Note that some of these rewards are non event related such as past event or new login.

Events

Here are some of the current events in the game to keep you busy for a little while.

 

Below is a list of upcoming shows and events so you don’t miss out on them!

  • Singin’ Orchestra
  • Standby Party! Collecting Notes!
  • Keyboard Resonance
  • On-Air Guerrilla Live Show!

In-Game Purchases

Of course, with the event, there are also in game purchases you can get! Lets take a look below at what those are, just try not to hurt your wallet too much!

Alice Gacha System

Being a Gacha game, there will be plenty of awesome stuff to get! We wish everyone good Gacha luck!

Bonus

While we are at it, let’s take a look at what we got in our Gacha’s!

 

Stage

During battle you will be able to enjoy a nice Miku and friends theme battle stage!

Where to Get Crash Fever

If any of this looks exciting, then make sure you download the game before its too late!

Crash Fever is available on Android and iOS.

The post HATSUNE MIKU x Crash Fever 2020 Crossover Has Officially Begun! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Hatsune Miku Mobile’s Gift Campaign Is Live!

item.description:

The post Hatsune Miku Mobile’s Gift Campaign Is Live! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Hatsune Miku Mobile is holding an in-game gift campaign that allows you to obtain amazing goods and deals for SNOW MIKU 2020, according to official sources.

【ミクモバ】初音ミクモバイルではスゴ得限定でSNOW MIKU 2020の素敵なグッズをGETできちゃうプレゼントキャンペーンを実施中！応募期間は1/31 11:00～2/13 11:00まで！まずは見てみて♪https://t.co/rQhPxB1QvT
#初音ミク #雪ミク #ミクモバ #スゴ得 pic.twitter.com/82SAWPs5xz

— 初音ミク 公式 (@cfm_miku) February 3, 2020

These goods include luxurious content that is exclusive to SNOW MIKU 2020 and we’ll detail them below:

  • “Sapporo Snow Festival” at 11th Street, Odori Venue featuring a new snow statue map of “Snow Miku Snow Parade Ver.”
  • TeddyLoid will be appearing at the “Winter Night Vivace !!” club event on Friday, February 7, 2020.
  • Limited production album “Planet Traveler feat. Hatsune Miku” will be released.
  • Limited production album made by the label KARENT will be released again this year alongside a special CD featuring the “SNOW MIKU 2020” theme song “Pikapaka no Hoshi” and many other songs that were recorded just for this.

We’re surely very excited for what’s to come and we cannot wait to check this amazing content as it releases! Let us know what you think in the comments!

Links

Karent’s Official Website

The post Hatsune Miku Mobile’s Gift Campaign Is Live! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Project Sekai “MORE MORE JUMP!” Character Profiles Revealed!
item.dc:creator: Monds
item.description:
The next band in Project Sekai “MORE MORE JUMP!” now has a profile for each character! Let’s take a look at them, shall we? Momoi Airi A former idol who appeared on a variety of shows to gain popularity. Although she was confident and assertive, she had love, passion and pride in her idol work. …

The post Project Sekai “MORE MORE JUMP!” Character Profiles Revealed! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
The next band in Project Sekai “MORE MORE JUMP!” now has a profile for each character!

Let’s take a look at them, shall we?

Momoi Airi

A former idol who appeared on a variety of shows to gain popularity. Although she was confident and assertive, she had love, passion and pride in her idol work. Now, for certain reasons, the company has closed and she has retired as an idol.

Hanasato Minori

A pure and dedicated worker. After seeing Kiritani Haruka of the idol group “ASRUN”, she was motivated to pursue being an idol. While going to various auditions, unfortunately she seemed to not be having any luck.

Kiritani Haruka

She is a part of “ASRUN”, an idol group that was popular nationally. She is very charismatic and was also very popular in the group. However, once the group disbanded, she retired from the entertainment business and returned to Miyamasuzaka Girls’ Academy where Minori also attends.

Hinomori Shizuku

Hinomori is still active and is part of the popular idol group “Cheerful X Days”. She has the appearance of a mysterious and charming adult that captivates her fans. However, her group members tend be jealous of her for this reason. She is in the same year as Airi but they also are in the same class together.

Stay tuned for the next group to be revealed!

Official website

The post Project Sekai “MORE MORE JUMP!” Character Profiles Revealed! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Project Sekai: Colorful Stage Character Profiles Revealed
item.dc:creator: Monds
item.description:
Some of the characters’ profiles for Project Sekai: Colorful Stage have been revealed! The ones that have been revealed so far are for the “Virtual Singer” Band (Crypton Future Media) as well as “Leo Need”. Virtual Singer Meiko A female virtual singer with a maroon short bob, a red short top, and a miniskirt. She …

The post Project Sekai: Colorful Stage Character Profiles Revealed appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Some of the characters’ profiles for Project Sekai: Colorful Stage have been revealed! The ones that have been revealed so far are for the “Virtual Singer” Band (Crypton Future Media) as well as “Leo Need”.

Virtual Singer

Meiko

A female virtual singer with a maroon short bob, a red short top, and a miniskirt. She has excellent singing abilities and a sense of stability, and she also has a warm and gentle voice quality.

Hatsune Miku

A virtual singer with blue-green twin tails. She sing songs of various genres with a bright and cute singing voice. Among virtual singers, her name is known worldwide regardless of generation.

Kagamine Rin

A virtual singer girl with blond bob hair, who also wears a large ribbon. Kagamine Len is her vocal twin. She has a charming singing voice that is cute and energetic.

Kagamine Len

A young virtual singer boy with his blond hair tied behind him. Kagamine Rin is his vocal twin. He has a powerful singing voice with a boyish core and rich emotional expression.

Megurine Luka

A female virtual singer characterized by her long pink hair. She has a soft singing voice that fits well with calm moods, and sometimes a passionate singing voice can be heard from her. She is bilingual and can sing in Japanese and English.

Kaito

A male virtual singer characterized by his dark blue hair and a long blue muffler outfit. With a refreshing and straightforward singing voice, his singing can range from a thick bass, to a high treble.

Leo Need

Hinomori Shiho

A lone wolf who hates habituation. She immerses herself in what she likes and doesn’t care what people think about her. She used to do a lot with her childhood friends and thought about them a lot too… She is the bassist at Leo Need

Hoshino Ichika

A girl that looks cool and really feels like a friend. Saki, Hoshino, and Shiho are childhood friends, but Hoshino and Shiho are in a jerky situation because of certain circumstances. She likes listening to Miku songs, and is in charge of guitar and vocals for Leo Need.

Tenma Saki

A proficient mood maker that is always bright and never smiles. Because she was born with an illness, she couldn’t go to junior high school. Later, she finally became well and returned for high school. “I was expecting a fun high school life with my childhood friends that I could reunite with after a long time”. She is in charge of keyboard for Leo Need.

Mochizuki Honami

She is an honor student for her sports and studies. She is kind. Ichika, Saki, and Shiho were childhood friends, but because something happened in junior high school, she began to stay away from them. She is in charge of drums at Leo Need.

Stay tuned to VNN for updates on the other band members!

You can visit their website here for more information!

 

 

 

The post Project Sekai: Colorful Stage Character Profiles Revealed appeared first on VNN.
